name: Ricetta: barchetta di patate
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Potato Boat.

customize.name: Patata
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Funghi di Rukkhashava
customize.desc: Un tipo di fungo che cresce sviluppando strati uno sopra l'altro, come a formare un mare di nuvole, e che cresce principalmente sugli alberi nel profondo della foresta pluviale.

customize.name: Formaggio
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

customize.name: Barchetta di patate
customize.desc: A baked appetizer. The potato was washed clean and then baked together with cheese and Rukkhashava Mushrooms. The dish guarantees an unmatched experience when eaten hot. This explains its popularity on the streets of Sumeru. Still, be careful not to burn your tongue.

value.text: World Quest The Gourmet Supremos: Cleanup
